text: this will be the first use of our very
own wedding pics if I can hold it my
name is carried me glee heo and I met my
husband to be Chris Bell log in Aruba in
october two thousand four and we're
getting married the saturday in
williamsburg brooklyn about three and a
half years ago i was on a tour with john
mayer and we were flying to Aruba to do
the river music festival the first night
we got there I actually saw him at the
bar and he wasn't part of our group and
at first I thought he was a local for
some reason and I thought oh he's he's
my type and went down to the beach for
you know for a beer and just to relax
and we picked a table and right across
from the table on a beach chair was
Carrie so my head was spinning and I was
at work and I was in work mode but I
thought oh wow this is a good
opportunity and so it just was so
amazing that I met him on the beach and
he happened to be with the band and we
got to go to the show neither of us had
business cards we just scribbled down an
email address and he sent me flowers
when we got back and poems and I said oh
this isn't going to work because he's
long distance
over 15 years of touring I've gotten
used to two things that you're going to
be a lonely person you'll have your
friends that are in every city that you
go to in the world and that becomes your
family that's the first thing you get
used to your relationships never work I
just had a weird feeling inside of me
that if I didn't persist on this that it
would be just another one of the times
in my life that you know something just
didn't work out he was in town for
christmas eve and christmas and I'd only
met him that one night in Aruba and he
was all by himself on Christmas Eve and
I invited him to come home to New Jersey
it was a big step because I have a big
Italian family we have the big you know
traditional seven-course Italian meal
the night before Christmas this it makes
me even more excited about getting to
know Kerry because she has this
incredible backing system her family's
there for her they have these events
that are absolutely nuts all the time
everybody comes over it just felt like
no one else was in the room and when we
were together so and I didn't care what
my family thought like usually you know
I have to get the approval and I even
care i just i think we had our first
kiss that night too just a quick kiss on
my way out the door after that night I
said I need to either accept his
unconventional lifestyle or not because
he travels 300 days a year so it was
what's it going to be like oh I miss you
you're go you know I had to accept it or
or not all I could think about was going
home to to see her and I believe i sent
a text message at about five in the
morning my time and told her I loved her
which I think it might have been the
first time that I actually said that I
love you by text but Phil Collins
divorced his wife with the facts so I
mean it's a new age last year he was he
was traveling with the Rolling Stone so
he was in Europe for three and a half
months is not once in almost three years
had carry even once broke down and
mentioned the fact that I was gone as
much as
had been I went to visit him halfway
through but it was kind of like you know
the home stretch I felt like if we could
get through this we could get through
anything because that was I think the
longest we were apart and then he came
back and he was asked to produce the
aruba music festival that year october
of last year and it was our three year
anniversary a good friend of mine that
runs a division of live nation he made
me an offer just doing the exact same
thing as I do but wait a minute I'm
going to be in in New York I'm going to
be home in my head I was like right this
couldn't be more of a perfect scenario
so I'm definitely going to do this and
I'm definitely going to ask her to marry
me in Aruba and on our anniversary the
third day into it we went to a private
island there's a peninsula that goes out
on the water and carry really likes
hammocks a lot so I figured well I got
to get to this hammock because that's
where I want to do this you know I
reached behind scratch my my head and I
sort of pulled the box out she hands me
the box and he says happy anniversary
and so I opened the box and there was a
ring and he said will you marry me and
thank you for putting up with me
travelling for you know three years and
I said yes so I'm crying good
it was like pretty a pretty stunning
moment no all this said sunshine from
the day seems to just rip right through
your potty and a turn red hot and I'm
